author: senh
title: Defensive positioning can play big role in MLB playoffs
text: BING NEWS: Defensive Positioning Can Play Big Role in MLB Playoffs One or two steps off, and maybe Mets third baseman David Wright is too far away to grab Starlin Castro's bases-loaded smash in Game 4 of the NL Championship Series.
